file.name: item-master-api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: 商品マスタ取得API
  version: 1.0.0
  description: "商品マスタ取得API"
  license:
    name: MIT license
    url: https://opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php
servers:
- url: 'https://{functionName}.azurewebsites.net/api/{apiVersion}'
  description: "Azure Functions server"
  variables:
    functionName:
      default: sr-item-master-api
    apiVersion:
      default: v1
- url: http://localhost:7071/api/{apiVersion}
  description: "Local server"
  variables:
    apiVersion:
      default: v1
paths:
  /company/{company-code}/store/{store-code}/items:
    post:
      operationId: items
      description: ストアコード、商品コードを指定し、商品マスタを取得する
      summary: 商品マスタの取得
      parameters:
      - name: company-code
        in: path
        description: "企業コード（例: 00100）"
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        example: "00100"
      - name: store-code
        in: path
        description: "ストアコード（例: 12345）"
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        example: "12345"
      requestBody:
        description: 商品コードの配列
        content:
          'application/json':
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                itemCodes:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    description: 商品コード
                    type: string
                    example: "4901427401646"
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            'application/json':
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  items:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        companyCode:
                          type: string
                          example: "00100"
                        description:
                          type: string
                          example: 筆ペン
                        descriptionLong:
                          type: string
                          example: 筆ペン
                        descriptionShort:
                          type: string
                          example: ﾌﾃﾞﾍﾟﾝ
                        entryDate:
                          type: string
                          example: 2009/08/04 12:06:04
                        id:
                          type: string
                          example: b875b7dd-8548-4de8-ac92-d926873e0d19
                        imageUrls:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                            example: https://xxxxxx/testimage.jpeg
                        itemCode:
                          type: string
                          example: 4901427401646
                        itemDetails:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: object
                        lastUpdateDate:
                          type: string
                          example: 2009/10/22 20:42:29
                        manufacturerCode:
                          type: string
                          example: null
                        mdHierarchies:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              description:
                                type: string
                                example: 筆記用具
                              descriptionShort:
                                type: string
                                example: ﾋｯｷﾖｳｸﾞ
                              entryDate:
                                type: string
                                example: 2009/07/29 12:04:35
                              lastUpdateDate:
                                type: string
                                example: 2009/07/29 12:04:35
                              mdHierarchyCode:
                                type: string
                                example: "00290200"
                              mdHierarchyLevel:
                                type: integer
                                example: 3
                              parentCode:
                                type: string
                                example: "0029"
                              taxCode:
                                type: string
                                example: "01"
                        storeCode:
                          type: string
                          example: "12345"
                        tax:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            description:
                              type: string
                              example: 内税8%
                            rate:
                              type: integer
                              example: 8
                            roundDigit:
                              type: integer
                              example: 0
                            roundMethod:
                              type: string
                              example: "01"
                            taxCode:
                              type: string
                              example: "01"
                            taxType:
                              type: string
                              example: "01"
                        unitCost:
                          type: integer
                          example: 0
                        unitPrice:
                          type: integer
                          example: 600
      security:
      - api_key: []
components:
  securitySchemes:
    api_key:
      type: apiKey
      name: x-functions-key
      in: header
